title: suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent for 0utdoors, Ultrasonic Snake Repeller Outdoor, Snake Repellent for Yard Powerful, Snake Away Scare for Outdoors Lawn Garden and Yard
descriptions:
Keep snakes and other unwelcome critters off your property—naturally. The suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent for Outdoors uses advanced ultrasonic technology to create a powerful, humane barrier around your lawn, garden, and yard without chemicals, mess, or maintenance.

Why you’ll love it:
- Ultrasonic protection every 30 seconds: Emits sonic pulses and vibrations at 400±100Hz to irritate and deter snakes and other animals from staying in your space.
- Wide-area coverage: Each unit helps protect up to 7,000 sq. ft. Place the 4-pack strategically for broad, overlapping coverage around patios, flower beds, sheds, and perimeters.
- Solar-powered convenience: No batteries or wiring. Just turn on, charge in the sun for 4–5 hours before first use, and let the sun keep them powered day after day.
- Built to last outdoors: Premium materials with IP44 waterproof rating stand up to rain, sprinklers, and changing weather for dependable, long-term performance.
- Safe and chemical-free: Keep your yard family- and pet-friendly. No toxins, traps, or poisons—just a gentle deterrent.
- More than snakes: Also helps repel deer, cats, rabbits, dogs, raccoons, skunks, rats, mice, armadillos, wild pigs, bears, foxes, and squirrels.

Simple setup:
- Turn on the device and allow 4–5 hours of direct sunlight for a full initial charge.
- Install with the head about 2 inches above the soil for optimal performance.
- Expect best results in 2–4 weeks as animals learn to avoid the protected area.

Make your outdoor space calm, clean, and critter-free with the suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent—powerful protection that’s smart, safe, and effortless.
